original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2721)@  在武將四周，召喚出10隻<color=#4cc769>丹陽兵</color>，攻擊附近的敵人。  <color=#4cc769>丹陽兵</color>屬性  <color=#FFE787>體力值：</color>$Soldier_HP(1301)@  武力值：$Soldier_Str(1301)@
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2721)@ Around the generals, 10 <color=#4cc769>Danyang soldiers</color> were summoned to attack nearby enemies. <color=#4cc769>Danyang Soldier</color> Attributes <color=#FFE787>Physical Strength: </color>$Soldier_HP(1301)@ Force Value:  $Soldier_Str(1301)@
